Uses of Class
com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http.HttpFilter

  • Packages that use HttpFilter 
    Package Description
    com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http  
    com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http.filteraction  

    • Uses of HttpFilter in com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http

      Subclasses of HttpFilter in com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DisableEncodeUrlFilter
      Disables the methods HttpServletResponse.encodeURL(String) and HttpServletResponse.encodeRedirectURL(String) (as well as the deprecated methods HttpServletResponse.encodeUrl(String) and HttpServletResponse.encodeRedirectUrl(String).

    • Uses of HttpFilter in com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http.filteraction

      Subclasses of HttpFilter in com.github.stefanbirkner.filtertools.filter.http.filteraction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActionsFilter
      Base class for filters that support FilterActions.
      class  PostFilterChainActionsFilter
      Executes FilterActions after invoking the FilterChain.
      class  PreFilterChainActionsFilter
      Executes FilterActions before invoking the FilterChain.
